title: Naked Being: Undressing Your Mind, Transforming Your Life
description: Best Books Award Finalist 2010 (USA Book News) in the genre of Spirituality"The little book which takes you on a mind-blowing journey to the Heart of Being." A collection of four hundred and fifty awakening insights, this volume is a fusion of mainstream spirituality, esoteric oneness and non-duality. The 450 short contemplative passages are written in clear, precise and thought provoking language as the author gently guides you towards the no-mind of pure Consciousness. A must have for the dedicated spiritual seeker, as anyone on the spiritual path of inner-discovery and illumination will find this unique book of lasting benefit.
author: J.M. Harrison
